Name: maintenance, tram | maintenance, tram | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/33:Repair and installation of machinery and equipment/331:Repair of fabricated metal products, machinery and equipment/3315:Repair of transport equipment, except motor vehicles
Description: The figures are derived from service garages in Switzerland and are employed for coaches, regular buses and trolley buses. For heating energy is assumed a split of 50% natural gas and 50% light fuel oil. The allocation between buses and trams is performed using the vkm-performance.
